setup.seedtext: Please enter your seed phrases here
setup.seedwarning: Your seedphrase will be encrypted and stored on your device only. Please make sure that you are alone when entering your seedphrase.
setup.seederror: Your seed phrase does not seem to be correct!
setup.seedpassworddescription: Set Password In order to encrypt your seed on this device, please provide a password.This password will be needed anytime you want to update your configuration.Password needs to have at least a length of 6.

messages.dfiaddressmissing: Please add your DFI address and seed in the settings page - otherwise this app does not make any sense! :)
